lines.gurmukhi: siq ibnu sMjmu n piq ibnu pUjw hoie sc ibnu soc n jnyaU jq hIn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sati Binu Sanjamu N Pati Binu Poojaa Hoi , Sach Binu Soch N Janayoo Jat Heen Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Except the name of the stable and firm Lord, no other deed is righteous. Except for the prayer and worship of Master Lord, worship of gods/goddesses is futile. No piety is beyond the truth and wearing of sacred thread without morality is futile.

lines.gurmukhi: ibnu gur dIiKAw igAwn ibnu drsn iDAwn Bwau ibnu Bgiq n kQnI BY BIn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Binu Gur Deekhiaa Giaan Binu Darasan Dhiaana , Bhaau Binu Bhagati N Kadanee Bhai Bheen Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Without obtaining initiation from a True Guru, no knowledge is worthwhile. No contemplation is useful except that of the True Guru. No worship is worth anything if not performed love, nor any view point expressed can invite respect.

lines.gurmukhi: swNiq n sMqoK ibnu suKu n shj ibnu sbd suriq ibnu pRym n pRbIn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saanti N Santokh Binu Soukhu N Sahaj Binu , Sabad Surati Binu Praym N Prabeen Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Without patience and contentment, peace cannot reside. No true peace and comfort is achievable without acquiring a state of equipoise. Similarly no love can be stable without the union of the word and mind (consciousness).

lines.gurmukhi: bHm ibbyk ibnu ihrdY n eyk tyk ibnu swDsMgq n rMg ilv lIn hY ]215]
lines.transliteration_english: Braham Bibayk Binu Hiradai N Ayk Tayka , Binu Saadhasangat N Rang Liv Leen Hai ?215?

Shabad OS B.translation: Without deliberation on His name, one cannot establish faith in the heart and without the holy congregation of divine and saintly persons, engrossment in Lord's name is not possible. (215)
